description: Abu Dhabi-based MGX is considering plans to raise billions of dollars in third-party capital as it looks to ramp up investments in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: AMD Under Pressure to Show AI Gains With Stock Beating Nvidia
description: Advanced Micro Devices Inc. earnings are expected to show the chipmaker is increasingly benefiting from the artificial intelligence arms race. The question is whether it’s enough to justify a rally that has outpaced Nvidia Corp.’s performance this year.

title: Google agrees to curb power use for AI data centers to ease strain on US grid when demand surges
description: They are the first formal agreements by Google in demand-response programs with utilities to temporarily curtail its machine learning workloads, a subset of artificial intelligence.
content:
Google has signed agreements with two U.S. electric utilities to reduce its AI data center power consumption during times of surging demand on the grid, the company said on Monday, as energy-intensive AI use outpaces power supplies.
Utilities in the ... [1656 chars]

title: TSMC cracks down on potential trade secret breach, initiates legal action
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co said on Tuesday it had launched legal proceedings and taken disciplinary action against employees involved in potential trade secret leaks after detecting unauthorized activities during routine monitoring. TSMC said in an emailed statement to Reuters that its "comprehensive and robust monitoring mechanisms" enabled early identification of the issue, leading to swift internal investigations and strict measures against the personnel involved. The case, now under judicial review, prevents the company from providing further details, said TSMC, the world's top producer of advanced artificial intelligence chips.

title: Billie Lourd Joins Star-Studded Cast of AI Drama 'Artificial'
description: Hollywood actor Billie Lourd has joined the cast of Amazon MGM Studios' new film 'Artificial'. Set in the world of artificial intelligence, the film features an ensemble cast including Andrew Garfield and Monica Barbaro. It chronicles the 2023 OpenAI leadership turmoil involving Sam Altman.
content: Billie Lourd, renowned for her role as Lieutenant Connix in the ''Star Wars'' trilogy, is the latest to join Amazon MGM Studios' AI-themed film ''Artificial''. The comedic drama, directed by Luca Guadagnino, features an ensemble cast with Andrew Garf... [647 chars]
